verses.verse: And there <S%H1980>went<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> to wife <S%H853>a<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son:<s%> and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> him <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> was a <S%H2896>goodly<s%> child, she <S%H6845>hid<s%> him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3391>months.<s%>

And when she <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H6845>hide<s%> him, she <S%H3947>took<s%> for him an <S%H8392>ark<s%> of <S%H1573>bulrushes,<s%> and <S%H2560>daubed<s%> it with <S%H2564>slime<s%> and with <S%H2203>pitch,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> therein; and she <S%H7760>laid<s%> it in the <S%H5488>flags<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H2975>river's<s%> <S%H8193>brink.<s%>
And his <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H3320>stood<s%> afar <S%H4480>off,<s%> <S%H7350><s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> would be <S%H6213>done<s%> to him.

And the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7364>wash<s%> herself <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H2975>river;<s%> and her <S%H5291>maidens<s%> walked <S%H1980>along<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H2975>river's<s%> <S%H3027>side;<s%> and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8392>ark<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5488>flags,<s%> she <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H519>maid<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> it.

And when she had <S%H6605>opened<s%> it, she <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3206>child:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5288>babe<s%> <S%H1058>wept.<s%> And she had <S%H2550>compassion<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is one of the Hebrews' <S%H4480>children.<s%> <S%H3206><s%> <S%H5680><s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> his <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> Shall I <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> to thee a <S%H802>nurse<s%> <S%H3243><s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the Hebrew <S%H5680>women,<s%> that she may <S%H3243>nurse<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> for thee?

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H1980>Go.<s%> And the <S%H5959>maid<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3206>child's<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H517>mother.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, Take this child <S%H1980>away,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H3206><s%> and <S%H3243>nurse<s%> it for me, and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> thy <S%H7939>wages.<s%> And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H5134>nursed<s%> it.

And the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and she <S%H935>brought<s%> him unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and he <S%H1961>became<s%> her <S%H1121>son.<s%> And she <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> and she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> I <S%H4871>drew<s%> him out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H1431>grown,<s%> that he went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked<s%> on their <S%H5450>burdens:<s%> and he <S%H7200>spied<s%> an <S%H376>Egyptian<s%> <S%H4713><s%> <S%H5221>smiting<s%> a <S%H376>Hebrew,<s%> <S%H5680><s%> one of his <S%H4480>brethren.<s%> <S%H251><s%>

And he <S%H6437>looked<s%> this <S%H3541>way<s%> and that <S%H3541>way,<s%> and when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> he <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> and <S%H2934>hid<s%> him in the <S%H2344>sand.<s%>

And when he went <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%> strove <S%H5327>together:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to him that did the <S%H7563>wrong,<s%> <S%H4100>Wherefore<s%> <S%H5221>smitest<s%> thou thy <S%H7453>fellow?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> <S%H7760>made<s%> thee a <S%H8269>prince<s%> and a <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us? <S%H559>intendest<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%> me, <S%H834>as<s%> thou <S%H2026>killedst<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian?<s%> And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3372>feared,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H403>Surely<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H3045>known.<s%>

Now when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> he <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H4480>face<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian:<s%> and he sat <S%H3427>down<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> a <S%H875>well.<s%>

Now the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> had <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1802>drew<s%> water, and <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7298>troughs<s%> to <S%H8248>water<s%> their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

And the <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and drove them <S%H1644>away:<s%> but <S%H4872>Moses<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H3467>helped<s%> them, and <S%H8248>watered<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7467>Reuel<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4069>How<s%> is it that ye are <S%H935>come<s%> so <S%H4116>soon<s%> <S%H3117>today?<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> An <S%H376>Egyptian<s%> <S%H4713><s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> us out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> drew water <S%H1802>enough<s%> <S%H1802><s%> for us, and <S%H8248>watered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> And <S%H346>where<s%> is he? <S%H4100>why<s%> is <S%H2088>it<s%> that ye have <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H376>man?<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> him, that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H2974>content<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H376>man:<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6855>Zipporah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

And she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1648>Gershom:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in a <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in process of <S%H3117>time,<s%> <S%H7227><s%> <S%H1992><s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H4191>died:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H584>sighed<s%> by reason <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5656>bondage,<s%> and they <S%H2199>cried,<s%> and their <S%H7775>cry<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> by reason <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5656>bondage.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H5009>groaning,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> looked <S%H7200>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3045>respect<s%> unto them.
